name: Creamy Blue Cheese & Onion Dip
description: A great dip for your favourite fresh-cut veggies.

ingredients.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix or Caesar Dressing Mix
French Onion Dip Mix or Toasted Onion

preparation: Let stand for half an hour before serving.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavour, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savory dish where you’d like to liven up the flavur with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!

products.name: Toasted Onion
summary: Sweet flavour of lightly toasted onion.
